妙在不言中.definition: the charm lies in what is left unsaid (idiom)

妙妙熊歷險記.pinyin: Miao4 miao4 xiong2 Li4 xian3 Ji4
妙妙熊歷險記.definition: Adventures of the Gummi Bears (Disney animated series)

妙手.definition: miraculous hands of a healer; highly skilled person; brilliant move in chess or weiqi (go) 圍棋|围棋

妙手回春.definition: (idiom) (of a doctor) to effect a miracle cure

妙手空空.definition: petty thief (lit. quick fingered and vanish); empty-handed; having nothing

妙招.definition: smart move; clever way of doing sth

妙法.definition: brilliant plan; ingenious method; perfect solution

妙用.definition: to use (sth) in an ingenious way; marvelously effective use

妙處.definition: ideal place; suitable location; merit; advantage

妙語橫生.definition: to be full of wit and humor

妙齡.definition: (of a girl) in the prime of youth
